definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The third part is the guarantee of the rationality of free proof system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为保障自由心证合理性的具体制度考察。

sentences.english: The simulation enunciates the validity of the model and the reasonableness of the PRF precision requirement.
sentences.chinese: 仿真验证了模型的有效性和要求的合理性。

sentences.english: Thus it is more suitable to regard Gan as a sub-category under the Hakka-Gan dialect.
sentences.chinese: 把赣方言看成是客赣语的一个次方言更有其合理性。

sentences.english: The numerical example is given and the reasonability of the method in this paper is verified.
sentences.chinese: 给出了数值算例，证实了本文方法的合理性。

sentences.english: His cognitive way contains not only rationalities but also limitations.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔都塞的认识方法有合理性也有局限性。

sentences.english: At last, At last, analyze rationality and future trend which theory exists each other.
sentences.chinese: 最后，分析了互文性理论存在的合理性和未来走向。

sentences.english: The anti-circumvention clause has its' validity and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 反规避条款有其存在的合法性和合理性。

sentences.english: To be effective and strengthen their legitimacy, the international institutions must also evolve.
sentences.chinese: 为体现效率和加强合理性，国际机构也应进行变革。

sentences.english: The validity and rationality of interaction coefficient of pilaster are examined by experiments.
sentences.chinese: 最后，通过试验验证该系数提出的合理性。

sentences.english: The second chapter analyses public security contract validity and rationality.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析治安承包的合法性与合理性。

sentences.english: The thoughts had rationalizations, yet with some limitations.
sentences.chinese: 老子的人本管理思想既有合理性，也有局限性。

sentences.english: Of course, the falsificationism methodology of Popper has rationality and progressive meaning.
sentences.chinese: 波普尔证伪主义方法论具有合理性和进步意义。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the legitimation of left gastric regional arterial infusion chemotherapy in the treatment of gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃左动脉区域灌注化疗治疗胃癌的合理性。

sentences.english: The rationality of pitch-regulated mechanism was demonstrated by experiments.
sentences.chinese: 利用实验装置验证变桨距机构的合理性。

sentences.english: What we should do is to use it appropriately and not become misers.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该做的是用它的合理性，以及不会成为守财奴。

sentences.english: The third section analyzes the rationality of the contract of water rights transfer .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要分析了水权转让合同存在的合理性。

definition: to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
